content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day January 25, 2017 Fake bank transfer emails stealing Bitcoin and passwords January 25, 2017 Cyren has discovered an outbreak of malware which is stealing passwords as well as Bitcoin from crypto-currency wallets on PCs. This versatile keylogger malware is being delivered as an attachment to phony bank transfer emails, which inform the recipient that they have received a deposit. The emails are originating primarily Company Partners Resources Investor Relations Products Freeware Demo Solutions Contact Us Privacy Management Service by Data443
